description: Ms. codex. Physical description: 16 lines per page. Written in maghribī script in black on beige paper. Headings, keywords and markings in red, green, blue or brown. Numerous tables. A few leaves are loose.
author: Iznīqī, ʻAlī, 15th cen
abstract: A commentary on the alchemical text Shudhūr al-dhahab by Ibn Arfaʻ Raʼs. Likely a unique manuscript.
alternative: Ṭawāliʻ al-budūr fī sharḥ abyāt ṣadr Dīwān al-shudhūr
طوال البدور في شرح ابيات صدر ديوان الشذور
